item.title: L4D2 Authoring Tools problem
item.dc:creator: RabidMonkey
item.description:
Since you’re using the gascan cluster it would probably be difficult to edit either of those since they probably have precompiled prop data that controls both of those effects…since it’s impossible to include custom particle effects with your map you’d have to fake it with a func_breakable and lots of env_fires or particle system entities that have fire particles.
